plot: A strange phone call and a wallet found in an old dark house lead 3 teenagers and their dog to follow a mysterious character across London.
plot_en: A strange phone call and a wallet found in an old dark house lead 3 teenagers and their dog to follow a mysterious character across London.
plot_es: A strange phone call and a wallet found in an old dark house lead 3 teenagers and their dog to follow a mysterious character across London.
title: The Tyrant King
